content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I'll start with a price of 1000 Euro per month. Please make your offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because as a responsible student, I'm in search of a more affordable option, considering my financial circumstances.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Understandable, let's end this negotiation. Best of luck with your search for a more affordable option.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
